name: Sapphire Blue Demo
description:
Join Sapphire on her journey, as she is forced to flee her hometown and explore the outside world, possibly making new allies and enemies alike. 

Please download the appropriate file for your system if available. Although the game can be played in the browser the loading times ruin the timing of several animations and events. The game will run much smoother if you download it.  

If you play in the browser your save data will be managed using cookies. If you delete your cookies or play the game in a different browser you won't have your save progress.

This is only a short demo. The project is currently being updated to run with the newest version of RPG Maker MV which also requires reworking several plugins used in the game.  A full game may be out by September 2021. 

This was a project for my 492 Engines and Platforms class at WSU.
